SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TPB.BOARD_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM ,TPB.BOARD_NO ,TPC.CATEGORY_NAME ,TPB.BOARD_TITLE ,TPB.USER_NO ,TPU.USER_ID ,TPB.MOD_DATE FROM TP_BOARD TPB LEFT JOIN TP_CATEGORY TPC ON TPB.CATEGORY_NO = TPC.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN TP_USER TPU ON TPB.USER_NO = TPU.USER_NO
AND DEL_FG = 0
AND TPB.CATEGORY_NO = #{category}
AND TPB.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT TPB.BOARD_NO ,TPC.CATEGORY_NAME ,TPB.CATEGORY_NO ,TPB.BOARD_TITLE ,TPB.BOARD_CONTENT ,TPU.USER_ID ,TPB.MOD_ID ,TPB.MOD_DATE ,TPB.USER_NO ,TF.FILE_NO ,TF.FILE_NAME ,TF.FILE_PATH ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TP_LIKE TL WHERE TL.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND TL.DEL_FG = 0) AS LIKE_CNT FROM TP_BOARD TPB LEFT JOIN TP_CATEGORY TPC ON TPB.CATEGORY_NO = TPC.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN TP_USER TPU ON TPB.USER_NO = TPU.USER_NO LEFT JOIN TP_BOARD_FILE TBF ON TPB.BOARD_NO = TBF.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN TP_FILE TF ON TBF.FILE_NO = TF.FILE_NO AND TF.DEL_FG = 0
AND TPB.DEL_FG = 0 AND TPB.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
